# Swarupkathi

| area_total_km2     = 4.98
| population_total   = 28529
}}
Swarupkathi () is a municipality in Nesarabad, Pirojpur, Barisal, Bangladesh. It is the administrative headquarters of Nesarabad Upazila.
History
In 17 December 1998, Swarupkathi Municipality was established.
Administration
Swarupkathi Municipality has 9 wards.
